sentences: Boby John (born 31 August 1970) is an Indian film sound designer  and mixing engineer.
He is one of India's best sync sound editors.
He owns a mixing studio, Prathibha, at Mumbai.
Boby John was born on 31 August 1970 in Vazhakulam, a small town near Muvattupuzha in Ernakulam district of Kerala state.
He then joined at Nirmala College, Muvattupuzha for his pre-degree course and later completed B. Sc in Physics in 1991.
In 1992, he joined at the Film and Television Institute of India, Pune, for the three year postgraduate diploma course in sound recording and sound design.
